org.janusproject.acl.encoding

Class JSONACLCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.janusproject.acl.encoding.JSONACLCodec
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BSONACLCodec

    public class JSONACLCodec
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encodes an ACLMessageContent in JSON or decodes an ACLMessageContent encoded in bytes to JSON
    Version:
    $FullVersion$
    Author:
    $Author: ngrenie$, $Author: bfeld$
